mapper.insert: insert into waiting(store_id, customer_id, name, phone, person_num) values(#{store_id}, #{customer_id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{person_num})
mapper.select: select * from waiting where store_id = #{param1} and customer_id = #{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from waiting where store_id = #{param1} and waiting_num = #{param2}
mapper.update: update waiting set waiting_num = waiting_num - 1 where store_id = #{param1} and waiting_num > #{param2}
mapper.select: select * from waiting where store_id = #{param1} order by waiting_num
mapper.update: update waiting set waiting_num = 0 where store_id = #{param1} and waiting_num = #{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from waiting where store_id = #{param1} and waiting_num = 0
mapper.select: select store_id, count(*) as totalwaiting from waiting group by store_id
